alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 515 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Valentine, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River and Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 192 and 210. Highway 97 between mile markers 135 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 201 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
